mapper.sql: id, employeeCode, ename, warehouseCode, tel, sex, birthday, password, token, positionId, imageUrl, createTime, isDeleted
mapper.insert: insert into sys_employee (id, employeeCode, ename, warehouseCode, tel, sex, birthday, password, token, positionId, imageUrl, createTime, isDeleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})

employeeCode = #{employeeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
